content: this is for the pumpkin pattern this pattern is free on my blog and my youtube channel the finished size is based on the yarn and hook size used a smaller hook and yarn will result in a smaller pumpkin a bigger hook and yarn will make a larger pumpkin this is a beginner friendly pattern any #4 worsted weight yarn will work in this pattern this pumpkin can be whipped up in an afternoon this is an original design by rachel cantrell rachels lovely stitches you may make and sell items made from this pattern but you are prohibited from copying this pattern and/or selling it as your own please link back to this post if posting your finished items online
